page.title: 09Buildings in Braunton.
page.content: Most builders in Braunton work 9 hrs a day & 7 days a week.{R.G.B.}are the main building contractors for Braunton's builders.{The shopping {centre}is a new addition to the village. It is of great help to the local community. Among it's many shops are a Butchers, a record shop and a Bike shop. Work has just been completed{(1985).}The plans for {Braunton Comprehensive School}were discussed in{1930.}The school was built in{1937.}There were objections from the Parish Council. They complained about the building site. Finally, the school was built on it's present site,{Barton Lane. }
